int.comment: pandas doesn't allow nulls in int columns so imposing this type will sometimes be problematic.  pandas 0.24.0 supports nullable ints but this feature is experimental

datetime.comment: you have to specify parse_dates in pandas

date.comment: pandas doesn't really have a datetime type it expects datetimes use parse_dates which returns a datetime

long.comment: pandas doesn't allow nulls in int columns so imposing this type will sometimes be problematic.  pandas 0.24.0 supports nullable ints but this feature is experimental
